item.description: I am a Postdoctoral Associate in the Information Systems Department at Boston University Questrom School of Business (affiliated with the Institute for Health System Innovation & Policy), advised by Prof. Dylan Walker. In graduate studies, I was under the mentorship of Prof. Woo-Sung Jung (Department of Industrial and Management Engineering, POSTECH) and Prof. Hyejin Youn (Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University). My research aims to understand how individuals process information and collectively shape sociotechnical systems. I use network science and machine learning approaches to identify latent factors of knowledge creation, cultural evolution, and misinformation spread on social media.
